QuestData.Title: Deathwingurlugull!
QuestData.Description:
Deathwingurlugull! Deathwingurlugull! Deathwingurlugull delgrbrrl!!
Grrrooooooooom blarglg!!
<You don't need a translation to know that they want you to bring down their murloc version of Deathwing. Before you can agree or disagree, the roars of a machine engine make their way toward you!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Get in the Hopper and defeat Deathwingurlugull!
QuestData.RewardText:
Lrgktrr O'Glrlrlrl!
<The murlocs celebrate your deeds this day!>
